title: Facts about AIDS
brief_description: A short introduction to AIDS which attempts to dispel some of the myths surrounding the disease. In simple language the video explores what the HIV virus is, how AIDS develops and how the virus is transmitted. Suitable for use in class discussions with young adolescents.
